name: AvikntosSwitch
short_description:
ανίκητος, (AvikntosSwitch) is an open source switch for ATMs and other alternate banking channels. It will encompass all the features, robustness which can be found in million dollar products in market. 

I have tried contributing to other open source projects of similar nature but none worked from concept to working. So, decided to start my own.

Why I am creating this project?  I beleive that EFT knowledge should go open source so that it can also reep the benefits of open source where people learn and contribute rather than remaining
a property of few big companies. JPos is a very good initiative but till date, we have not seen a full fledge ATM/EFT Switch which is open source.

It's time to create one and break the ice!
